actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to adjust the maximum level of civil penalties under the Consumer Product Safety Act to account for inflation.
short_title: Consumer Product Safety Enforcement Act of 1989

summary.text: Consumer Product Safety Enforcement Act of 1989 - Amends the Consumer Product Safety Act to: (1) increase civil penalties imposed in connection with violations of consumer product safety requirements; and (2) require indexing of maximum penalty amounts.

titles.title: Consumer Product Safety Enforcement Act of 1989
A bill to adjust the maximum level of civil penalties under the Consumer Product Safety Act to account for inflation.
